name: Jonathan Sahagun
text: Ok I think I got it na. Naka-kasa na sa text editor ko yung sagot, and I'm pretty sure this is the one. Pero hindi ko muna ipo-post para marami pang maka-enjoy sa pag hunt down ng solution.  :)    I think I'll give a couple of hints, though.    1. If there were as much as 1024 barrels of wine, you could still do it with 10 tasters.    2. If the poison was insta-kill and you only had an hour before the party, it could still be done (assuming infinite bladder capacity on the part of the tasters)

source_obj.text: Ok I think I got it na. Naka-kasa na sa text editor ko yung sagot, and I'm pretty sure this is the one. Pero hindi ko muna ipo-post para marami pang maka-enjoy sa pag hunt down ng solution.  :)    I think I'll give a couple of hints, though.    1. If there were as much as 1024 barrels of wine, you could still do it with 10 tasters.    2. If the poison was insta-kill and you only had an hour before the party, it could still be done (assuming infinite bladder capacity on the part of the tasters)
